statements.select:
select a.BehaviorCode,a.Id,a.Status,a.BehaviorName,case when b.BehaviorCode is not null then cast(1 as bit) else cast(0 as bit) end Checked from Sys_Behavior a left join Sys_MenuBehavior b on a.BehaviorCode=b.BehaviorCode and b.MenuId=#MenuId#
a.BehaviorCode=#BehaviorCode# a.Id=#Id# a.Status=#Status# a.BehaviorName=#BehaviorName# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select a.BehaviorCode,CAST(1 as bit) as PermitFlag from Sys_Behavior a inner join Sys_MenuBehavior b on a.BehaviorCode=b.BehaviorCode
MenuId=#MenuId# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select a.BehaviorCode,case when c.ResourceId is null then CAST(0 as bit) else CAST(1 as bit) end as PermitFlag from Sys_Behavior a inner join Sys_MenuBehavior b on a.BehaviorCode=b.BehaviorCode left join ( select distinct ResourceId from pub_groupPermit x inner join Pub_GroupMember y on x.GroupId = y.GroupId where UserId=#UserId# and len(ResourceId) = 8 )c on (b.MenuId+'-'+a.BehaviorCode) = c.ResourceId
MenuId=#MenuId# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$
